elements.name: panel1
elements.title: Which of the three sentences is most similar in meaning to the question or statement above? Mark it!

elements.name: Frage 1
elements.title: He advocates a liberal economic policy.
choices: He believes that the economy should be restricted by as few regulations as possible.
He has no opinion on the economy
He thinks the economy needs more rules.
elements.correctAnswer: He believes that the economy should be restricted by as few regulations as possible.

elements.name: question2
elements.title: Migration policy has been the subject of much debate in recent years.
choices: Issues surrounding the migration of Internet data were the subject of much political discussion.
Questions about how to deal with immigrants and emigrants led to many political discussions.
Questions surrounding Migros advertising led to many political discussions.
elements.defaultValue: Er findet, die Wirtschaft soll durch möglichst wenig Vorschriften eingeschränkt werden.
elements.correctAnswer: Questions about how to deal with immigrants and emigrants led to many political discussions.

elements.name: panel2
elements.title: Which of the three sentences is most similar in meaning to the question or statement above? Mark it!

elements.name: question1
elements.title: She would like to see less regulation with regard to store opening hours.
choices: She would like stores to be freer to determine their opening hours.
She wants fewer shelves in the stores.
She would like to see stricter rules on store opening hours.
elements.defaultValue: Er findet, die Wirtschaft soll durch möglichst wenig Vorschriften eingeschränkt werden.
elements.correctAnswer: She would like stores to be freer to determine their opening hours.

elements.name: question3
elements.title: In Switzerland, there is a certain amount of state redistribution.
choices: Switzerland supports exchange platforms.
In Switzerland, the rich pay more taxes than the poor.
In Switzerland, the state takes money from the rich and gives it to the poor.
elements.defaultValue: Er findet, die Wirtschaft soll durch möglichst wenig Vorschriften eingeschränkt werden.
elements.correctAnswer: In Switzerland, the state takes money from the rich and gives it to the poor.

elements.name: panel3
elements.title: Which of the three sentences is most similar in meaning to the question or statement above? Mark it!

elements.name: question4
elements.title: Some warn that internal security is at stake with cybercrime.
choices: They fear that there will be more break-ins due to the digital possibilities.
They fear that more crime, terrorism and other threats will develop from within a country.
They fear that crime within large companies is on the rise.
elements.correctAnswer: They fear that more crime, terrorism and other threats will develop from within a country.

elements.name: question5
elements.title: Switzerland is a welfare state.
choices: The Swiss state supports the weaker members of society - for example through state redistribution.
In Switzerland, you behave socially because that's how you're brought up.
In Switzerland, an above-average amount of social welfare is claimed because many people have socialist attitudes.
elements.defaultValue: Er findet, die Wirtschaft soll durch möglichst wenig Vorschriften eingeschränkt werden.
elements.correctAnswer: The Swiss state supports the weaker members of society - for example through state redistribution.

elements.name: question6
elements.title: He is clearly in favor of law and order.
choices: He would like to see more lawyers representing low-income people in court.
He calls for strict laws that are enforced consistently and, if necessary, with a heavy hand by the police.
He loves American crime series.
elements.defaultValue: Er findet, die Wirtschaft soll durch möglichst wenig Vorschriften eingeschränkt werden.
elements.correctAnswer: He calls for strict laws that are enforced consistently and, if necessary, with a heavy hand by the police.
